sentences: The Secretariat introduced the item ( FCCC/SB/2009/4 and Summary , INF.6, and FCCC/SBI/2009/14 ).
The Expert Group on Technology Transfer (EGTT) presented its 2009 report ( FCCC/SB/2009/INF.6 ), as well as its report on performance indicators ( FCCC/SB/2009/4 and Summary ).

Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Holger Liptow (Germany) will co-chair a joint SBI/SBSTA contact group to consider issues of common interest.
